page.title: 06REDBOURN BY_PASS
page.content: { Redbourn By_Pass}was opened in November{1984}. Before Redbourn had a By_Pass all traffic used the{A5}road which runs through the centre of the village and is known as the High Street between the railway bridge in the south and the junction with Harpenden Lane (B487) in the north.Very heavy traffic uses this route and with lorries unloading in the High Street and the road being quite narrow several traffic jams and accidents happened. At rush hours there were long traffic jams from the{B487}into the High Street and from Harpeneden Lane and the{B487 Hemel Hempstead Road} junction at{Fish Street}into the High Street. Several alternative plans for a{ {By_Pass}were considered.
